Name: Cave Escape
About the game: Cave Escape is a classic brutal endless runner game starring a dexterous green creature wielding a grappling hook. This 2018 edition features all new obstacles plus Story mode with light RPG elements and a dose of nihilistic philosophy. For the daring, the original gameplay is still available in Infinite mode. Be warned, however, as peril comes swiftly in the Volcano of the Damned!
